review: Allows us to stream hbo go to our tv.  Also very compact and easy to travel with.  Highly recommend this product .
author: Bo

review: Works great.... can access Amazon Prime and Netflix plus others! My only complaint is it stays connected after you are through watching! I haven't found any way to turn it off completely other than unplug it, but I'm still getting used to the remote so maybe there's more than I have found.
author: R A.

review: It's good but not as fast as the Roku. I have the Fire TV stick in my living room and Roku in my bedroom. I wish the remote were larger--I seem to misplace it all the time.
author: A. Jordan

review: A lot more functionality than a Chromecast. Works great with just the included remote. Cheap way to make any TV "smart".
author: V. R. Albright "Yeah Toast!"

review: This device is a great way to access Netflix, which my wife and I love watching in our chill time. Our daughter uses all the other functions, and says they work great too.
author: David Acuna

review: Who would have thought you could get so much entertainment from a stick? Love mine and was easy to hook up and use.
author: Foodie
